trans-unit.source: Geo-Restore - PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Geo-Restore - PowerShell

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: This guide shows you how to recover an Azure SQL database using REST API.
trans-unit.target: This guide shows you how to recover an Azure SQL database using REST API.

trans-unit.source: Links to more detailed operations are provided.
trans-unit.target: Links to more detailed operations are provided.

trans-unit.source: Geo-Restore is the core disaster recovery protection included for all Basic, Standard, and Premium Azure SQL Databases service tiers.
trans-unit.target: Geo-Restore is the core disaster recovery protection included for all Basic, Standard, and Premium Azure SQL Databases service tiers.

trans-unit.source: Restrictions and Security
trans-unit.target: Restrictions and Security

trans-unit.source: See [Recover an Azure SQL Database using Geo-Restore in the Azure portal](sql-database-geo-restore-tutorial-management-portal.md).
trans-unit.target: See [Recover an Azure SQL Database using Geo-Restore in the Azure portal](sql-database-geo-restore-tutorial-management-portal.md).

trans-unit.source: How to: Recover an Azure SQL database using REST API
trans-unit.target: How to: Recover an Azure SQL database using REST API

trans-unit.source: Get your list of recoverable databases using the [List Recoverable Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn800984.aspx) operation.
trans-unit.target: Get your list of recoverable databases using the [List Recoverable Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn800984.aspx) operation.

trans-unit.source: Get the database you want to recover using the [Get Recoverable Database](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn800985.aspx) operation.
trans-unit.target: Get the database you want to recover using the [Get Recoverable Database](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn800985.aspx) operation.

trans-unit.source: Create the recovery request using the [Create Database Recovery Request](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn800986.aspx) operation.
trans-unit.target: Create the recovery request using the [Create Database Recovery Request](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn800986.aspx) operation.

trans-unit.source: Track the status of the recovery using the [Database Operation Status](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn720371.aspx) operation.
trans-unit.target: Track the status of the recovery using the [Database Operation Status](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn720371.aspx) operation.

trans-unit.target: Next steps
